Name: Lighthouse Stories - Book one: Part one
About the game: The Lighthouse universe now is open with this new Point and Click game, highly narrative with psychological horror. 'You don't remember who you're, and why you're here. But your past demons remember very well and will haunt you. This train station hide a lot of secrets of your life and look like a new beginning of a new age... for you.' â—†Game. Short Point and Click game with focus in its secrets and one mystery puzzle. 45 tense minutes experience. Fully pre-rendered images. Explore the Train Station to find why you are here visiting 3 locations. Fully narrative and with amazing ambient sounds.
